single_device.name: mg_lmbd
single_device.mgs: timers = eh_t01, counters=eh_c01, lmbd, lmbd_countsroi1,lmbd_countsroi1_atten, lmbd_countsroi2, lmbd_countsroi2_atten

single_device.name: mg_lmbd_atten
single_device.mgs: timers = eh_t01, counters=eh_c01, lmbd, lmbd_countsroi1,lmbd_countsroi1_atten, lmbd_countsroi2, lmbd_countsroi2_atten, p23/vmexecutor/attenuator/Position, p23/vmexecutor/attenuatorPosition/Position

single_device.comment: Q-space for the 6 -circle (senv DiffracDevice controller/diffrac6cp23/e6c; senv Psi pm/e6c/4)
single_device.name: e6c
single_device.hkl: omega_t = 36, mu = 39, omega = 40, chi = 41, phi = 48, gamma = 37, delta = 38, energydevice=hasep23oh:10000/p23/dcmener/oh.01

single_device.comment: Q-space for the 4 -circle (senv DiffracDevice controller/diffrac4cp23/h4c; senv Psi pm/h4c/1)
single_device.name: h4c

single_device.comment: PETRA ring current, over a period of time triggered by the timer
single_device.name: avg_beamcurrent

single_device.comment: PILCVFCADC channel 1 voltage, over a period of time triggered by the timer
single_device.name: avg_pilcvfcadc1

single_device.comment: the voltages measured by PiLC, the server is PILCVFCADC
single_device.name: pilc_voltage1

single_device.comment: the voltages measured by PiLC, the server is PILCVFCADC
single_device.name: pilc_voltage2

single_device.comment: Anton Paar temperature, taken from the Eurotherm2406 server
single_device.name: anton_paar_temperature

single_device.comment: PseudoMotor Anton Paar setpoint, over eurotherm 2604
single_device.name: apaar_setpoint

serial_device.comment: change the delays for pump laser and bunch clock synchronization
serial_device.name: DG645 delay generator

single_device.name: mg_lmbd
single_device.mgs: timers = eh_t01, counters=eh_c01, lmbd, lmbd_countsroi1,lmbd_countsroi1_atten, lmbd_countsroi2, lmbd_countsroi2_atten, lmbd_countsroi3, lmbd_countsroi3_atten, lmbd_countsroi4, outputchannela, pos_mot_eh37, pos_mot_eh38, pos_mot_eh40, pos_atten, pos_atten_pos
